name: Mobile
description: You gain one extra [MP] and you gain a +4 bonus to your [DODGE] against any [OPPORTUNITY ATTACK]. Additionally escaping a grapple or standing up from prone requires 2 [MP] less.

name: Immovable
description: Gain a +2 bonus to [HARDNESS] that increases to a +4 bonus when you reach [LEVEL] 7. Additionally when an ability forcefully moves you, you only move halve the distance (rounded down).

name: Quick Reflexes
description: Gain a +1 bonus to [DODGE] that increases to a +2 bonus when you reach [LEVEL] 7. Additionally if you are suprised you suffer no penalties except to your Initiative.

name: Enduring
description: Gain a +2 bonus to [TOUGHNESS] that increases to a +4 bonus when you reach [LEVEL] 7. Additionally when any of the following Status Effect is applied to you, the duration is halved (rounded up): [BLINDED], [DAZED], [DEAFENED], [SILENCED], [POISONED], [BLEEDING], [POISON]

name: Mind of Steel
description: Gain a +2 bonus to [WILLPOWER] that increases to a +4 bonus when you reach [LEVEL] 7. Additionally when any of the following Status Effect is applied to you, the duration is halved (rounded up): [CHARMED] , [FRIGHTENED] , [CONFUSED]
